constraints.name: comprehend_sentiment_value_check
constraints.definition: CHECK (((sentiment)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['POSITIVE'::character varying, 'NEGATIVE'::character varying, 'NEUTRAL'::character varying, 'MIXED'::character varying])::text[])))

v_asset_custom_fields.definition:
SELECT a.id AS asset_id,
    a.bynder_id,
    a.name AS asset_name,
    f.label AS field_label,
    f.field_type,
    acfv.value,
    acfv.value_json,
    s.label AS section_label,
    t.label AS tab_label
   FROM ((((assets a
     JOIN asset_custom_field_values acfv ON ((a.id = acfv.asset_id)))
     JOIN ib_custom_fields f ON ((acfv.custom_field_id = f.id)))
     JOIN ib_custom_sections s ON ((f.section_id = s.id)))
     JOIN ib_custom_tabs t ON ((s.tab_id = t.id)))
  ORDER BY a.bynder_id, t.label, s.label, f.label;

v_asset_custom_form_filters.definition:
SELECT a.id AS asset_id,
    a.bynder_id,
    a.name AS asset_name,
    f.name_en AS filter_name,
    fo.value_en AS filter_value,
    fo.option_uuid,
    acffv.synced_at
   FROM (((assets a
     JOIN asset_custom_form_filter_values acffv ON ((a.id = acffv.asset_id)))
     JOIN ib_custom_form_filters f ON ((acffv.filter_id = f.id)))
     JOIN ib_custom_form_filter_options fo ON ((acffv.filter_option_id = fo.id)))
  ORDER BY a.bynder_id, f.name_en;

v_asset_entities_summary.definition:
SELECT a.id AS asset_id,
    a.name AS asset_name,
    ce.entity_type,
    count(*) AS entity_count,
    avg(ce.confidence_score) AS avg_confidence,
    array_agg(ce.entity_text ORDER BY ce.confidence_score DESC) AS top_entities
   FROM (assets a
     JOIN comprehend_entities ce ON ((a.id = ce.resource_id)))
  GROUP BY a.id, a.name, ce.entity_type;

v_asset_filters.definition:
SELECT a.id AS asset_id,
    a.bynder_id,
    a.name AS asset_name,
    f.name AS filter_name,
    f.ib_id AS filter_ib_id,
    fo.value AS filter_value,
    fo.option_uuid,
    afv.synced_at
   FROM (((assets a
     JOIN asset_filter_values afv ON ((a.id = afv.asset_id)))
     JOIN ib_filters f ON ((afv.filter_id = f.id)))
     JOIN ib_filter_options fo ON ((afv.filter_option_id = fo.id)))
  ORDER BY a.bynder_id, f.name;

v_asset_sentiment_overview.definition:
SELECT a.id AS asset_id,
    a.name AS asset_name,
    a.asset_type,
    a.decade,
    cs.sentiment,
    cs.positive_score,
    cs.negative_score,
    cs.neutral_score,
    cs.mixed_score,
    cs.analyzed_at
   FROM (assets a
     JOIN comprehend_sentiment cs ON ((a.id = cs.resource_id)))
  ORDER BY cs.analyzed_at DESC;

v_asset_stats_by_decade.definition:
SELECT decade,
    count(*) AS count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((asset_type)::text = 'Audio'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS audio_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((asset_type)::text = 'Videos'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS video_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((asset_type)::text = 'Photo'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS photo_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((asset_type)::text = 'Documents'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS document_count
   FROM assets
  WHERE ((deleted_at IS NULL) AND (decade IS NOT NULL))
  GROUP BY decade
  ORDER BY decade;

v_asset_stats_by_type.definition:
SELECT asset_type,
    count(*) AS count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((rights_information)::text = 'Free for Use'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS free_for_use_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN ((rights_information)::text = 'Permission Required'::text) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS permission_required_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (needs_identification = true) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS needs_identification_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (needs_restoration = true) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS needs_restoration_count,
    count(
        CASE
            WHEN (needs_description = true) THEN 1
            ELSE NULL::integer
        END) AS needs_description_count
   FROM assets
  WHERE (deleted_at IS NULL)
  GROUP BY asset_type
  ORDER BY (count(*)) DESC;

v_assets_by_teacher.definition:
SELECT t.name AS teacher_name,
    count(DISTINCT a.id) AS asset_count,
    count(DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN ((a.asset_type)::text = 'Audio'::text) THEN a.id
            ELSE NULL::uuid
        END) AS audio_count,
    count(DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN ((a.asset_type)::text = 'Videos'::text) THEN a.id
            ELSE NULL::uuid
        END) AS video_count
   FROM ((teachers t
     JOIN asset_teachers at ON ((t.id = at.teacher_id)))
     JOIN assets a ON ((at.asset_id = a.id)))
  WHERE (a.deleted_at IS NULL)
  GROUP BY t.id, t.name
  ORDER BY (count(DISTINCT a.id)) DESC;

v_assets_by_topic.definition:
SELECT t.name AS topic_name,
    count(DISTINCT a.id) AS asset_count,
    count(DISTINCT
        CASE
            WHEN ((a.rights_information)::text = 'Free for Use'::text) THEN a.id
            ELSE NULL::uuid
        END) AS free_for_use_count
   FROM ((topics t
     JOIN asset_topics at ON ((t.id = at.topic_id)))
     JOIN assets a ON ((at.asset_id = a.id)))
  WHERE (a.deleted_at IS NULL)
  GROUP BY t.id, t.name
  ORDER BY (count(DISTINCT a.id)) DESC;

v_assets_complete.definition:
SELECT a.id,
    a.bynder_id,
    a.name,
    a.description,
    a.short_description,
    a.alt_title,
    a.folder_path,
    a.webdam_folder_path,
    a.s3_bucket,
    a.dropbox_link,
    a.youtube_url,
    a.asset_type,
    a.asset_sub_type,
    a.rights_information,
    a.height,
    a.width,
    a.orientation,
    a.original_format,
    a.media_duration_seconds,
    a.location_id,
    a.event_id,
    a.decade,
    a.publication_date,
    a.needs_identification,
    a.needs_restoration,
    a.needs_description,
    a.physical_condition,
    a.quality,
    a.bin_number,
    a.session,
    a.value_level,
    a.mobile_app_flags,
    a.inventory_id,
    a.accreditation,
    a.copyright,
    a.copyright_xmp,
    a.describer,
    a.notes,
    a.usage_notes,
    a.asset_references,
    a.duplicates,
    a.search_vector,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    a.deleted_at,
    l.venue,
    l.country,
    l.city,
    e.event_type,
    e.event_name,
    e.event_features,
    array_agg(DISTINCT t.name) FILTER (WHERE (t.name IS NOT NULL)) AS topics,
    array_agg(DISTINCT te.name) FILTER (WHERE (te.name IS NOT NULL)) AS teachers,
    array_agg(DISTINCT p.name) FILTER (WHERE (p.name IS NOT NULL)) AS participants
   FROM ((((((((assets a
     LEFT JOIN locations l ON ((a.location_id = l.id)))
     LEFT JOIN events e ON ((a.event_id = e.id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_topics atop ON ((a.id = atop.asset_id)))
     LEFT JOIN topics t ON ((atop.topic_id = t.id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_teachers ate ON ((a.id = ate.asset_id)))
     LEFT JOIN teachers te ON ((ate.teacher_id = te.id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_participants ap ON ((a.id = ap.asset_id)))
     LEFT JOIN participants p ON ((ap.participant_id = p.id)))
  WHERE (a.deleted_at IS NULL)
  GROUP BY a.id, a.bynder_id, a.name, a.description, a.short_description, a.alt_title, a.folder_path, a.webdam_folder_path, a.s3_bucket, a.dropbox_link, a.youtube_url, a.asset_type, a.asset_sub_type, a.rights_information, a.height, a.width, a.orientation, a.original_format, a.media_duration_seconds, a.location_id, a.event_id, a.decade, a.publication_date, a.needs_identification, a.needs_restoration, a.needs_description, a.physical_condition, a.quality, a.bin_number, a.session, a.value_level, a.mobile_app_flags, a.inventory_id, a.accreditation, a.copyright, a.copyright_xmp, a.describer, a.notes, a.usage_notes, a.asset_references, a.duplicates, a.search_vector, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.deleted_at, l.venue, l.country, l.city, e.event_type, e.event_name, e.event_features;

v_custom_fields_hierarchy.definition:
SELECT t.id AS tab_id,
    t.tab_uuid,
    t.label AS tab_label,
    s.id AS section_id,
    s.section_uuid,
    s.label AS section_label,
    f.id AS field_id,
    f.field_uuid,
    f.label AS field_label,
    f.field_type,
    f.validation_type,
    count(DISTINCT acfv.asset_id) AS usage_count
   FROM (((ib_custom_tabs t
     LEFT JOIN ib_custom_sections s ON ((t.id = s.tab_id)))
     LEFT JOIN ib_custom_fields f ON ((s.id = f.section_id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_custom_field_values acfv ON ((f.id = acfv.custom_field_id)))
  GROUP BY t.id, t.tab_uuid, t.label, s.id, s.section_uuid, s.label, f.id, f.field_uuid, f.label, f.field_type, f.validation_type
  ORDER BY t.label, s.label, f.label;

v_custom_form_filter_options_usage.definition:
SELECT fo.id,
    fo.option_uuid,
    fo.value_en,
    fo.value_fr,
    f.name_en AS filter_name,
    f.ib_uuid AS filter_ib_uuid,
    count(DISTINCT acffv.asset_id) AS usage_count,
    fo.sort_order,
    fo.synced_at
   FROM ((ib_custom_form_filter_options fo
     JOIN ib_custom_form_filters f ON ((fo.filter_id = f.id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_custom_form_filter_values acffv ON ((fo.id = acffv.filter_option_id)))
  GROUP BY fo.id, fo.option_uuid, fo.value_en, fo.value_fr, f.name_en, f.ib_uuid, fo.sort_order, fo.synced_at
  ORDER BY f.name_en, fo.sort_order;

v_custom_form_filters_summary.definition:
SELECT f.id,
    f.ib_uuid,
    f.name_en,
    f.name_fr,
    f.multiple,
    f.resource_filter_range,
    f.tools,
    count(DISTINCT o.id) AS option_count,
    count(DISTINCT acffv.asset_id) AS assets_using_count,
    f.synced_at
   FROM ((ib_custom_form_filters f
     LEFT JOIN ib_custom_form_filter_options o ON ((f.id = o.filter_id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_custom_form_filter_values acffv ON ((f.id = acffv.filter_id)))
  GROUP BY f.id, f.ib_uuid, f.name_en, f.name_fr, f.multiple, f.resource_filter_range, f.tools, f.synced_at
  ORDER BY f.name_en;

v_filter_options_usage.definition:
SELECT fo.id,
    fo.option_uuid,
    fo.value,
    f.name AS filter_name,
    f.ib_id AS filter_ib_id,
    count(DISTINCT afv.asset_id) AS usage_count,
    fo.sort_order,
    fo.synced_at
   FROM ((ib_filter_options fo
     JOIN ib_filters f ON ((fo.filter_id = f.id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_filter_values afv ON ((fo.id = afv.filter_option_id)))
  GROUP BY fo.id, fo.option_uuid, fo.value, f.name, f.ib_id, fo.sort_order, fo.synced_at
  ORDER BY f.name, fo.sort_order;

v_filter_summary.definition:
SELECT f.id,
    f.ib_id,
    f.ib_uuid,
    f.name,
    f.multiple,
    f.required,
    f.resource_filter_range,
    count(DISTINCT o.id) AS option_count,
    count(DISTINCT afv.asset_id) AS assets_using_count,
    f.ib_create_time,
    f.ib_last_update_time,
    f.synced_at
   FROM ((ib_filters f
     LEFT JOIN ib_filter_options o ON ((f.id = o.filter_id)))
     LEFT JOIN asset_filter_values afv ON ((f.id = afv.filter_id)))
  GROUP BY f.id, f.ib_id, f.ib_uuid, f.name, f.multiple, f.required, f.resource_filter_range, f.ib_create_time, f.ib_last_update_time, f.synced_at
  ORDER BY f.name;

v_sync_history.definition:
SELECT id,
    started_at,
    completed_at,
    EXTRACT(epoch FROM (completed_at - started_at)) AS duration_seconds,
    duration_ms,
    status,
    files_processed,
    files_created,
    files_updated,
        CASE
            WHEN (errors IS NULL) THEN 'No errors'::text
            WHEN (length(errors) < 100) THEN errors
            ELSE ("substring"(errors, 1, 100) || '...'::text)
        END AS error_summary
   FROM sync_logs
  ORDER BY started_at DESC
 LIMIT 30;

v_sync_stats.definition:
SELECT count(*) AS total_syncs,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE ((status)::text = 'success'::text)) AS successful_syncs,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE ((status)::text = 'partial_success'::text)) AS partial_success_syncs,
    count(*) FILTER (WHERE ((status)::text = 'failed'::text)) AS failed_syncs,
    sum(files_processed) AS total_files_processed,
    sum(files_created) AS total_files_created,
    sum(files_updated) AS total_files_updated,
    max(started_at) AS last_sync_time,
    avg(EXTRACT(epoch FROM (completed_at - started_at))) AS avg_duration_seconds
   FROM sync_logs
  WHERE (started_at > (now() - '30 days'::interval));

v_top_locations.definition:
SELECT entity_text AS location_name,
    count(DISTINCT resource_id) AS asset_count,
    avg(confidence_score) AS avg_confidence,
    max(confidence_score) AS max_confidence
   FROM comprehend_entities
  WHERE ((entity_type)::text = 'LOCATION'::text)
  GROUP BY entity_text
  ORDER BY (count(DISTINCT resource_id)) DESC, (avg(confidence_score)) DESC;

v_top_organizations.definition:
SELECT entity_text AS org_name,
    count(DISTINCT resource_id) AS asset_count,
    avg(confidence_score) AS avg_confidence,
    max(confidence_score) AS max_confidence
   FROM comprehend_entities
  WHERE ((entity_type)::text = 'ORGANIZATION'::text)
  GROUP BY entity_text
  ORDER BY (count(DISTINCT resource_id)) DESC, (avg(confidence_score)) DESC;

v_top_people.definition:
SELECT entity_text AS person_name,
    count(DISTINCT resource_id) AS asset_count,
    avg(confidence_score) AS avg_confidence,
    max(confidence_score) AS max_confidence
   FROM comprehend_entities
  WHERE ((entity_type)::text = 'PERSON'::text)
  GROUP BY entity_text
  ORDER BY (count(DISTINCT resource_id)) DESC, (avg(confidence_score)) DESC;

vw_embedding_stats.definition:
SELECT embedding_model,
    content_type,
    count(*) AS embeddings_count,
    count(DISTINCT resource_id) AS unique_assets,
    min(created_at) AS first_embedded,
    max(created_at) AS last_embedded,
    avg(pg_column_size(embedding)) AS avg_embedding_size_bytes
   FROM asset_embeddings e
  GROUP BY embedding_model, content_type
  ORDER BY embedding_model, content_type;
